meanings.definition: A person who holds a pen.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the penholders to write their names on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The penholders in the office always have colorful pens on their desks.
meanings.sent3: The penholders at the meeting were eager to jot down important notes.
meanings.sent4: She was the fastest penholder in the class, always ready to write.
meanings.sent5: The penholders in the library were quiet and focused on their writing.

meanings.definition: A device used to hold a pen.
meanings.sent1: The penholders on the desk kept the pens organized and easy to find.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new penholder to keep her favorite pen safe.
meanings.sent3: The penholders on sale were colorful and stylish, perfect for any desk.
meanings.sent4: The antique penholder on the shelf added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The penholders in the store were made of glass, metal, and wood.
